# lyne-teaser-list


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabelledBy` | `aria-labelled-by` | aria-labelledby should contain the id of the title component associated with the teaser list. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `personalised`   | `personalised`     | Property for lyne-panel. See lyne-panel for additional info                                   | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot                  | Description                                               |
| --------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"teaser-list__item"` | Use this to render the teaser items with the links inside |
